game.title: Golden Sword Quest
game.objective: Retrieve the Golden Sword from the Dragon's Lair
game.description: The kingdom is under attack by a fearsome dragon. The only weapon that can defeat it is the legendary Golden Sword, hidden deep within its lair. Seek out the bravest adventurer to embark on this quest.

task.objective: Speak to the wise sage for clues about the location of the Dragon's Lair
task.description: The wise sage, located in the village square, can provide valuable information about the Dragon's Lair. Listen carefully and make a note of his cryptic hints.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the Dragon's Lair
task.description: Based on the sage's hints, search for the hidden entrance to the Dragon's Lair. It is said to be located deep within a dark forest, near an ancient stone bridge.
task.location: Dark Forest near Ancient Stone Bridge

task.objective: Defeat the dragon and retrieve the Golden Sword
task.description: Once inside the lair, face the fearsome dragon and defeat it in combat to claim the legendary Golden Sword.
